job_title: Azure Solutions Architect with MLOPS Exp.
job_description:
Hi

We have an immediate Openings with Our Direct Client for a Long term contract position

Job Title: Azure Solutions Architect with MLOPS Exp

Location: Dallas TX - Onsite

Duration: 12 months

Summary

We are seeking a highly skilled Azure Solutions Architect with a strong background in MLOps to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing and implementing end-to-end solutions on the Azure cloud platform, with a particular focus on Databricks and SparkML. Your expertise in machine learning operations will be critical in ensuring the success of our data and analytics projects

Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
• Proven experience as an Azure Solutions Architect with a strong MLOps background.
• In-depth knowledge of Azure services, Databricks, and SparkML.
• Strong understanding of machine learning operations, model deployment, and monitoring.
• Proficiency in data processing, data engineering, and analytics.
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
• Azure certifications (e.g., Azure Solutions Architect Expert) preferred.

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Proven experience as an Azure Solutions Architect with a strong MLOps background
In-depth knowledge of Azure services, Databricks, and SparkML
Strong understanding of machine learning operations, model deployment, and monitoring
Proficiency in data processing, data engineering, and analytics
Responsibilities: In this role, you will be responsible for designing and implementing end-to-end solutions on the Azure cloud platform, with a particular focus on Databricks and SparkML
Your expertise in machine learning operations will be critical in ensuring the success of our data and analytics projects
